title: "NXP, Amazon partner to connect cars to cloud computing services"
excerpt: "Dutch chipmaker NXP Semiconductors NXPI.O on Tuesday said it had entered a strategic relationship with Amazon.com's AMZN.O cloud computing unit to help cars communicate with data centers. NXP is one of the biggest suppliers of computing chips to automakers and Amazon Web Services is the largest cloud computing service by revenue."
